alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 6:29PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Shoshone, northeastern Benewah and southeastern Kootenai Counties through 630 PM PDT... At 529 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near St. Maries, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Coeur d`Alene, Hayden, St. Maries, Dalton Gardens, Pinehurst, Hayden Lake, Harrison, Parkline, Fourth Of July Pass, Fernan Lake Village, Medimont, Kingston, Chatcolet, Beauty Creek Campground, Wolf Creek Campground, Rose Lake, and Cataldo. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 in Idaho between mile markers 11 and 44. U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 428 and 436. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Panhandle Mountains; Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse
